p: Tang et al. ( 2020) confirmed that anticoagulant therapy by heparin (an anticoagulant) specially with low molecular weight heparin improved the prognosis in severely ill patients with nCOVID-19. Furthermore, 28-day mortality of heparin receivers was found to be lower as compared to the non-users among individuals with sepsis-stimulated coagulopathy scores 4 or D-dimer > 6-times the upper limit of normal (Tang et al., 2020).
